VARDESC: Which of the following best describes your work situation in the two weeks prior to the COVID-19 outbreak?
Did you start a new job during the COVID-19 outbreak?
COMMENT1: ASK IF 'Which of the following best describes your work situation in the two weeks prior to the COVID-19 outbreak?' = ('Looking for work, unemployed' OR 'Unemployed, not looking' OR 'Temporarily laid off' OR 'Retired' OR 'Homemaker' OR 'Maternity Leave' OR 'Illness/sick leave' OR 'Disabled')

VARDESC: What setting(s) were you working in the two weeks before the COVID-19 outbreak? [check all that apply]
COMMENT1: ASK IF 'Which of the following best describes your work situation in the two weeks prior to the COVID-19 outbreak?' = ('Working full time' OR 'Working part time' OR 'Self-employed' OR 'Other')
column18: In a medical setting (hospital, clinic, doctor's office, urgent care center, etc.)
column19: In an office or apartment building
column20: In a private household(s) (nanny, housekeeper, etc.)
column21: In a setting with regular customer interaction (delivery, transport, retail, food service, restaurant, etc.)
column22: In the community as a first responder (police, EMS, firefighter, etc.)

VARDESC: What setting(s) were you working in the two weeks before the COVID-19 outbreak? Other: please specify
COMMENT1: ASK IF 'What setting(s) were you working in the two weeks before the COVID-19 outbreak?' = 'Other'

VARDESC: What kind of work did you do?
COMMENT1: ASK IF 'Which of the following best describes your work situation in the two weeks prior to the COVID-19 outbreak?' = ('Working full time' OR 'Working part time' OR 'Self-employed' OR 'Other')

VARDESC: If employed before COVID-19 outbreak, ask: Did you lose any job(s) during the covid-19 outbreak?
COMMENT1: ASK IF 'Which of the following best describes your work situation in the two weeks prior to the COVID-19 outbreak?' = ('Working full time' OR 'Working part time' OR 'Self-employed' OR 'Other')
column18: Yes, I was laid off from a job
column19: Yes, I was furloughed from a job
column20: Yes, I lost all my jobs

VARDESC: Did you continue to work at all during the COVID-19 outbreak?
COMMENT1: ASK IF 'Did you lose any job(s) during the covid-19 outbreak?' = 'Yes, I was laid off from a job' OR 'Did you lose any job(s) during the covid-19 outbreak?' = 'Yes, I was furloughed from a job'

VARDESC: Did you start or get [a new/another] job during the COVID-19 outbreak?
COMMENT1: ASK IF 'Did you continue to work at all during the COVID-19 outbreak?' = 'Yes'

VARDESC: Did you experience significant changes with your job (e.g. workload, hours, pay, etc.) because of or during the outbreak? [check all that apply]
COMMENT1: ASK IF 'Did you continue to work at all during the COVID-19 outbreak?' = 'Yes'

VARDESC: Did you experience significant changes with your job (e.g. workload, hours, pay, etc.) because of or during the outbreak? Other: please specify
COMMENT1: ASK IF 'Did you experience significant changes with your job (e.g. workload, hours, pay, etc.) because of or during the outbreak?' = 'Yes, other significant change'

VARDESC: What setting(s) have you been working in since the COVID-19 outbreak began? [check all that apply]
COMMENT1: ASK IF 'Did you continue to work at all during the COVID-19 outbreak?' = 'Yes' OR 'Did you start a new job during the COVID-19 outbreak?' = 'Yes'
column18: In a medical setting (hospital, clinic, doctor's office, urgent care center, etc.)
column19: In an office or apartment building
column20: In a private household(s) (nanny, housekeeper, etc.)
column21: In a setting with regular customer interaction (delivery, transport, retail, food service, restaurant, etc.)
column22: In the community as a first responder (police, EMS, firefighter, etc.)

VARDESC: What setting(s) have you been working in since the COVID-19 outbreak began? Other: please specify
COMMENT1: ASK IF 'What setting(s) have you been working in since the COVID-19 outbreak began?' = 'Other'

VARDESC: In the weeks before COVID-19 outbreak began, were you a student (enrolled in an academic program)?
After the COVID-19 outbreak began, did you continue to be a student?
COMMENT1: ASK IF 'In the weeks before COVID-19 outbreak began, were you a student (enrolled in an academic program)?' = 'Full time student' OR 'In the weeks before COVID-19 outbreak began, were you a student (enrolled in an academic program)?' = 'Part time student'
column18: No, graduated or finished program early

VARDESC: Since the COVID-19 outbreak, has your school offered classes remotely?
COMMENT1: ASK IF 'After the COVID-19 outbreak began, did you continue to be a student?' = 'Yes'

VARDESC: Did you experience an increase or decrease in schoolwork (time spent working)?
COMMENT1: ASK IF 'After the COVID-19 outbreak began, did you continue to be a student?' = 'Yes'

VARDESC: [Has it been/Was it] hard to get your [work/schoolwork] done because of other responsibilities at home (taking care of children, family, tension, space)?
COMMENT1: ASK IF 'What setting(s) have you been working in since the COVID-19 outbreak began?' = 'At home' OR 'Since the COVID-19 outbreak, has your school offered classes remotely?' = 'Yes'

VARDESC: [Has it been/Was it] hard to get your [work/school work] done because of your home environment (internet, computers, tension, space)?
COMMENT1: ASK IF 'What setting(s) have you been working in since the COVID-19 outbreak began?' = 'At home' OR 'Since the COVID-19 outbreak, has your school offered classes remotely?' = 'Yes'

VARDESC: Did anyone in your house lose their job or lose a significant amount of their income as a result of the COVID-19 outbreak?
Who lost their job or a significant amount of income as a result of the COVID-19 outbreak?
COMMENT1: ASK IF 'Did anyone in your house lose their job or lose a significant amount of their income as a result of the COVID-19 outbreak?' = 'Yes'
column22: Other family members (e.g. aunt, uncle, cousin)

VARDESC: Who lost their job or a significant amount of income as a result of the COVID-19 outbreak? Other: please specify
COMMENT1: ASK IF 'Who lost their job or a significant amount of income as a result of the COVID-19 outbreak?' = 'Other'
